title: Compounding Formula Management System Web Application Development (.Net Full Stack Development)
description: Project Medisca develops a tool to address the Compounding Services needs of the chemists, pharmacists, and sales representatives. The goal is to capture the formula requests from the customers, to provide a tool for the chemist to produce the formula with all the ingredients and references needed. The formula must follow the approval process before being sent to the customer and published on our website. This web application with be our Formula Management System. Mission Your mission is to collaborate with our internal development team to extend the workforce. You will work on an application REST API based using .Net Core with an MS SQL database. You will also work on the web application using Blazor and the Syncfusion library. All the requirements are documented in Jira user stories which must be delivered in 2 weeks sprints. The user stories follow the three c’s principle. The code is versioned in GitHub and the implementation must follow the gitflow. This mission is planned for 8 weeks of 35h (current estimation, can be revised). Your mission could be extended if you are able to migrate the application on the Azure Cloud using the web application template. Currently the application is hosted on our on-premises servers. Environment Medisca is a global corporation leveraging strong partnerships to serve healthcare professionals across diverse wellness disciplines. Offering extensive and essential solutions - including pharmaceutical ingredients and service, mixing technology manufacturing, analytical testing, and education – Medisca is bridging the gaps in healthcare with an unwavering commitment to precision, innovation, and societal impact. You will collaborate with the IT team on an Agile project. Your main contacts will be the other developers, the business analyst, the product owner and solution architects. Medisca is in constant growth and digital initiatives are increasing each year. So, be ready to have more than one opportunity in case of great collaboration. Profile We are looking for a web application expert. Someone curious about the technology and the project, with the desire to collaborate.
